name: Mr. Slime Round1 GTKO
description:
My entry for Round 1 for the GTKO!

Controls:

move :WASD or ARROW KEYS

jump: W or UP arrow or Space

to summon:

Z: for Stone Slime

X: for Bouncy Slime

C: for Right facing fire slime

SHIFT KEY: for Left facing fire slime

to Kill the slimes press: ENTER
